versions.code:
import React from 'react'; import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react'; import { AppShell, AppShellHeader, AppShellMain, AppShellNavbar, Title, Text, Card, CardSection, Image, Badge, Button, Group, Stack, SimpleGrid, Divider, Avatar, Progress, Paper, NavLink } from '@mantine/core'; const meta: Meta = { title: 'Generated/Women\'s Athletic Apparel Dashboard's Athletic Apparel', parameters: { layout: 'fullscreen' }, tags: ['autodocs'], }; export default meta; type Story = StoryObj; export const Dashboard: Story = { render: () => ( AthleteWear Admin Dashboard Navigation

Total Products 247 +12% this month
Active Orders 89 +5% from last week
Revenue $45.2K +23% this month
Customer Satisfaction 4.8/5

Impact Sports Bra New Maximum support sports bra for high-impact activities $54.99 218 sold Stock: 203 units
Mesh Training Tank Featured Breathable mesh panel tank top for optimal ventilation $39.99 195 sold Stock: 89 units
Recent Activity New order #3847 5 min ago Stock alert: Training Tank 23 min ago Product review received 1 hour ago New customer registered 2 hours ago
